    org.waarp.openr66.protocol.http.restv2.converters
    This package regroups the different utility classes used to convert between database objects and their representations as ObjectNode.

    This package regroups all the general purpose Netty ChannelHandlers of the REST API.
    org.waarp.openr66.protocol.http.restv2.utils
    A series of utility classes for the RESTv2 handlers.
